text: - DK Metcalf here.

Today I'm using AWS Gen
AI to make two cleats

for Prison Fellowship and
Sound for My Cause My Cleats.

- Hi!
- I've always represented
Prison Fellowship for My Cause My Cleats

and that's to bring more
light to the situation,

which is prisoners who don't
have a a second chance.
They're people just like us.
Their voices need to be heard.
That just really touched my heart.
Prison Fellowship and with Sound,
last year I started learning ASL.
You from here?

And Sound cover up a
wide variety of causes,

but one of the causes
that struck my attention
was deaf community up here.
Y'all ready to go create a shoe?

- Yeah.
- Yes, sir.
- In the past, I would probably

just leave it up to the
artist, but with AWS Gen AI,
it just gives me an opportunity
to put my hands on the project,
sit down with the organizations.
With the AWS Gen AI,
it really just gave us a open book
of whatever direction we wanted to go,
but what the cleat is going to look like.
Ooo! You see that?

AI did a very good job and
they brought out stars,
flowers, a lot of bright colors,
a lot of messages on the shoe.
- I could put 'em on right now.
- I think it was gonna be big and, plus,

on game day to have their
work of art on the NFL field,

it's something they can
look at and be like,

"I created that."
(upbeat music)
